00079 #define ICON_IMAGE_W        600
00080 #define ICON_IMAGE_H        640

00083 #define ICON_GRID_ROWS      30

00089 typedef struct IconImage {
00090     int w;
00091     int h;
00092     unsigned int *rect; 
00093 } IconImage;
00094 
00095 typedef void (*VectorDrawFunc)(int x, int y, int w, int h, float alpha);
00096 
00097 #define ICON_TYPE_PREVIEW   0
00098 #define ICON_TYPE_TEXTURE   1
00099 #define ICON_TYPE_BUFFER    2
00100 #define ICON_TYPE_VECTOR    3
00101 
00102 typedef struct DrawInfo {
00103     int type;
00104 
00105     union {
00106         /* type specific data */
00107         struct {
00108             VectorDrawFunc func;
00109         } vector;
00110         struct {
00111             IconImage *image;
00112         } buffer;
00113         struct {
00114             int x, y, w, h;
00115         } texture;
00116     } data;
00117 } DrawInfo;
00118 
00119 typedef struct IconTexture {
00120     GLuint id;
00121     int w;
00122     int h;
00123     float invw;
00124     float invh;
00125 } IconTexture;

00128 /* static here to cache results of icon directory scan, so it's not 
00129  * scanning the filesystem each time the menu is drawn */
00130 static struct ListBase iconfilelist = {NULL, NULL};
00131 static IconTexture icongltex = {0, 0, 0, 0.0f, 0.0f};

00135 static void def_internal_icon(ImBuf *bbuf, int icon_id, int xofs, int yofs, int size, int type)
00136 {
00137     Icon *new_icon = NULL;
00138     IconImage *iimg = NULL;
00139     DrawInfo *di;
00140     int y = 0;
00141     int imgsize = 0;
00142 
00143     new_icon = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Icon), "texicon");
00144 
00145     new_icon->obj = NULL; /* icon is not for library object */
00146     new_icon->type = 0; 
00147 
00148     di = MEM_callocN(sizeof(DrawInfo), "drawinfo");
00149     di->type = type;
00150 
00151     if (type == ICON_TYPE_TEXTURE) {
00152         di->data.texture.x = xofs;
00153         di->data.texture.y = yofs;
00154         di->data.texture.w = size;
00155         di->data.texture.h = size;
00156     }
00157     else if (type == ICON_TYPE_BUFFER) {
00158         iimg = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(IconImage), "icon_img");
00159         iimg->rect = MEM_mallocN(size * size * sizeof(unsigned int), "icon_rect");
00160         iimg->w = size;
00161         iimg->h = size;
00162 
00163         /* Here we store the rect in the icon - same as before */
00164         imgsize = bbuf->x;
00165         for (y = 0; y < size; y++) {
00166             memcpy(&iimg->rect[y * size], &bbuf->rect[(y + yofs) * imgsize + xofs], size * sizeof(int));
00167         }
00168 
00169         di->data.buffer.image = iimg;
00170     }
00171 
00172     new_icon->drawinfo_free = UI_icons_free_drawinfo;
00173     new_icon->drawinfo = di;
00174 
00175     BKE_icon_set(icon_id, new_icon);
00176 }
00177 
00178 static void def_internal_vicon(int icon_id, VectorDrawFunc drawFunc)
00179 {
00180     Icon *new_icon = NULL;
00181     DrawInfo *di;
00182 
00183     new_icon = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Icon), "texicon");
00184 
00185     new_icon->obj = NULL; /* icon is not for library object */
00186     new_icon->type = 0;
00187 
00188     di = MEM_callocN(sizeof(DrawInfo), "drawinfo");
00189     di->type = ICON_TYPE_VECTOR;
00190     di->data.vector.func = drawFunc;
00191 
00192     new_icon->drawinfo_free = NULL;
00193     new_icon->drawinfo = di;
00194 
00195     BKE_icon_set(icon_id, new_icon);
00196 }

00200 /* Utilities */

00202 static void viconutil_set_point(GLint pt[2], int x, int y)
00203 {
00204     pt[0] = x;
00205     pt[1] = y;
00206 }
00207 
00208 static void viconutil_draw_tri(GLint(*pts)[2])
00209 {
00210     glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00211     glVertex2iv(pts[0]);
00212     glVertex2iv(pts[1]);
00213     glVertex2iv(pts[2]);
00214     glEnd();
00215 }
00216 
00217 static void viconutil_draw_lineloop(GLint(*pts)[2], int numPoints)
00218 {
00219     int i;
00220 
00221     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00222     for (i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) {
00223         glVertex2iv(pts[i]);
00224     }
00225     glEnd();
00226 }
00227 
00228 static void viconutil_draw_lineloop_smooth(GLint(*pts)[2], int numPoints)
00229 {
00230     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00231     viconutil_draw_lineloop(pts, numPoints);
00232     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00233 }
00234 
00235 static void viconutil_draw_points(GLint(*pts)[2], int numPoints, int pointSize)
00236 {
00237     int i;
00238 
00239     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00240     for (i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) {
00241         int x = pts[i][0], y = pts[i][1];
00242 
00243         glVertex2i(x - pointSize, y - pointSize);
00244         glVertex2i(x + pointSize, y - pointSize);
00245         glVertex2i(x + pointSize, y + pointSize);
00246         glVertex2i(x - pointSize, y + pointSize);
00247     }
00248     glEnd();
00249 }

00251 /* Drawing functions */
00252 
00253 static void vicon_x_draw(int x, int y, int w, int h, float alpha)
00254 {
00255     x += 3;
00256     y += 3;
00257     w -= 6;
00258     h -= 6;
00259 
00260     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00261 
00262     glLineWidth(2.5);
00263     
00264     glColor4f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, alpha);
00265     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00266     glVertex2i(x, y);
00267     glVertex2i(x + w, y + h);
00268     glVertex2i(x + w, y);
00269     glVertex2i(x, y + h);
00270     glEnd();
00271 
00272     glLineWidth(1.0);
00273     
00274     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00275 }
00276 
00277 static void vicon_view3d_draw(int x, int y, int w, int h, float alpha)
00278 {
00279     int cx = x + w / 2;
00280     int cy = y + h / 2;
00281     int d = MAX2(2, h / 3);
00282 
00283     glColor4f(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, alpha);
00284     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00285     glVertex2i(x, cy - d);
00286     glVertex2i(x + w, cy - d);
00287     glVertex2i(x, cy + d);
00288     glVertex2i(x + w, cy + d);
00289 
00290     glVertex2i(cx - d, y);
00291     glVertex2i(cx - d, y + h);
00292     glVertex2i(cx + d, y);
00293     glVertex2i(cx + d, y + h);
00294     glEnd();
00295     
00296     glColor4f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, alpha);
00297     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00298     glVertex2i(x, cy);
00299     glVertex2i(x + w, cy);
00300     glVertex2i(cx, y);
00301     glVertex2i(cx, y + h);
00302     glEnd();
00303 }
00304 
00305 static void vicon_edit_draw(int x, int y, int w, int h, float alpha)
00306 {
00307     GLint pts[4][2];
00308 
00309     viconutil_set_point(pts[0], x + 3,     y + 3);
00310     viconutil_set_point(pts[1], x + w - 3, y + 3);
00311     viconutil_set_point(pts[2], x + w - 3, y + h - 3);
00312     viconutil_set_point(pts[3], x + 3,     y + h - 3);
00313 
00314     glColor4f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, alpha);
00315     viconutil_draw_lineloop(pts, 4);
00316 
00317     glColor3f(1, 1, 0.0);
00318     viconutil_draw_points(pts, 4, 1);
00319 }
00320 
00321 static void vicon_editmode_hlt_draw(int x, int y, int w, int h, float alpha)
00322 {
00323     GLint pts[3][2];
00324 
00325     viconutil_set_point(pts[0], x + w / 2, y + h - 2);
00326     viconutil_set_point(pts[1], x + 3,     y + 4);
00327     viconutil_set_point(pts[2], x + w - 3, y + 4);
00328 
00329     glColor4f(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, alpha);
00330     viconutil_draw_tri(pts);
00331 
00332     glColor4f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1);
00333     viconutil_draw_lineloop_smooth(pts, 3);
00334 
00335     glColor3f(1, 1, 0.0);
00336     viconutil_draw_points(pts, 3, 1);
00337 }
00338 
00339 static void vicon_editmode_dehlt_draw(int x, int y, int w, int h, float UNUSED(alpha))
00340 {
00341     GLint pts[3][2];
00342 
00343     viconutil_set_point(pts[0], x + w / 2, y + h - 2);
00344     viconutil_set_point(pts[1], x + 3,     y + 4);
00345     viconutil_set_point(pts[2], x + w - 3, y + 4);
00346 
00347     glColor4f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1);
00348     viconutil_draw_lineloop_smooth(pts, 3);
00349 
00350     glColor3f(.9f, .9f, .9f);
00351     viconutil_draw_points(pts, 3, 1);
00352 }

00354 static void vicon_disclosure_tri_right_draw(int x, int y, int w, int UNUSED(h), float alpha)
00355 {
00356     GLint pts[3][2];
00357     int cx = x + w / 2;
00358     int cy = y + w / 2;
00359     int d = w / 3, d2 = w / 5;
00360 
00361     viconutil_set_point(pts[0], cx - d2, cy + d);
00362     viconutil_set_point(pts[1], cx - d2, cy - d);
00363     viconutil_set_point(pts[2], cx + d2, cy);
00364 
00365     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00366     glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00367     glColor4f(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f, alpha);
00368     glVertex2iv(pts[0]);
00369     glVertex2iv(pts[1]);
00370     glColor4f(0.3f, 0.3f, 0.3f, alpha);
00371     glVertex2iv(pts[2]);
00372     glEnd();
00373     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00374 
00375     glColor4f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1);
00376     viconutil_draw_lineloop_smooth(pts, 3);
00377 }
00378 
00379 static void vicon_small_tri_right_draw(int x, int y, int w, int UNUSED(h), float alpha)
00380 {
00381     GLint pts[3][2];
00382     int cx = x + w / 2 - 4;
00383     int cy = y + w / 2;
00384     int d = w / 5, d2 = w / 7;
00385 
00386     viconutil_set_point(pts[0], cx - d2, cy + d);
00387     viconutil_set_point(pts[1], cx - d2, cy - d);
00388     viconutil_set_point(pts[2], cx + d2, cy);
00389 
00390     glColor4f(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f, alpha);
00391 
00392     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00393     glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00394     glVertex2iv(pts[0]);
00395     glVertex2iv(pts[1]);
00396     glVertex2iv(pts[2]);
00397     glEnd();
00398     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00399 }

00401 static void vicon_disclosure_tri_down_draw(int x, int y, int w, int UNUSED(h), float alpha)
00402 {
00403     GLint pts[3][2];
00404     int cx = x + w / 2;
00405     int cy = y + w / 2;
00406     int d = w / 3, d2 = w / 5;
00407 
00408     viconutil_set_point(pts[0], cx + d, cy + d2);
00409     viconutil_set_point(pts[1], cx - d, cy + d2);
00410     viconutil_set_point(pts[2], cx, cy - d2);
00411 
00412     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00413     glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00414     glColor4f(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f, alpha);
00415     glVertex2iv(pts[0]);
00416     glVertex2iv(pts[1]);
00417     glColor4f(0.3f, 0.3f, 0.3f, alpha);
00418     glVertex2iv(pts[2]);
00419     glEnd();
00420     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00421 
00422     glColor4f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1);
00423     viconutil_draw_lineloop_smooth(pts, 3);
00424 }

00426 static void vicon_move_up_draw(int x, int y, int w, int h, float UNUSED(alpha))
00427 {
00428     int d = -2;
00429 
00430     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00431     glLineWidth(1);
00432     glColor3f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00433 
00434     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00435     glVertex2i(x + w / 2 - d * 2, y + h / 2 + d);
00436     glVertex2i(x + w / 2, y + h / 2 - d + 1);
00437     glVertex2i(x + w / 2 + d * 2, y + h / 2 + d);
00438     glEnd();
00439 
00440     glLineWidth(1.0);
00441     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00442 }
00443 
00444 static void vicon_move_down_draw(int x, int y, int w, int h, float UNUSED(alpha))
00445 {
00446     int d = 2;
00447 
00448     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00449     glLineWidth(1);
00450     glColor3f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00451 
00452     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00453     glVertex2i(x + w / 2 - d * 2, y + h / 2 + d);
00454     glVertex2i(x + w / 2, y + h / 2 - d - 1);
00455     glVertex2i(x + w / 2 + d * 2, y + h / 2 + d);
00456     glEnd();
00457 
00458     glLineWidth(1.0);
00459     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00460 }

00462 #ifndef WITH_HEADLESS
00463 static void init_brush_icons(void)
00464 {
00465 
00466 #define INIT_BRUSH_ICON(icon_id, name)                                        \
00467     {                                                                         \
00468         bbuf = IMB_ibImageFromMemory((unsigned char *)datatoc_ ##name## _png, \
00469                                      datatoc_ ##name## _png_size,             \
00470                                      IB_rect, "<brush icon>");                \
00471         def_internal_icon(bbuf, icon_id, 0, 0, w, ICON_TYPE_BUFFER);          \
00472         IMB_freeImBuf(bbuf);                                                  \
00473     } (void)0
00474     /* end INIT_BRUSH_ICON */
00475 
00476     ImBuf *bbuf;
00477     const int w = 96;
00478 
00479     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_ADD, add);
00480     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_BLOB, blob);
00481     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_BLUR, blur);
00482     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_CLAY, clay);
00483     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_CLAY_STRIPS, claystrips);
00484     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_CLONE, clone);
00485     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_CREASE, crease);
00486     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_DARKEN, darken);
00487     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_SCULPT_DRAW, draw);
00488     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_FILL, fill);
00489     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_FLATTEN, flatten);
00490     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_GRAB, grab);
00491     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_INFLATE, inflate);
00492     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_LAYER, layer);
00493     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_LIGHTEN, lighten);
00494     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_MIX, mix);
00495     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_MULTIPLY, multiply);
00496     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_NUDGE, nudge);
00497     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_PINCH, pinch);
00498     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_SCRAPE, scrape);
00499     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_SMEAR, smear);
00500     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_SMOOTH, smooth);
00501     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_SNAKE_HOOK, snake_hook);
00502     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_SOFTEN, soften);
00503     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_SUBTRACT, subtract);
00504     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_TEXDRAW, texdraw);
00505     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_THUMB, thumb);
00506     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_ROTATE, twist);
00507     INIT_BRUSH_ICON(ICON_BRUSH_VERTEXDRAW, vertexdraw);
00508 
00509 #undef INIT_BRUSH_ICON
00510 }
00511 
00512 static void init_internal_icons(void)
00513 {
00514     bTheme *btheme = UI_GetTheme();
00515     ImBuf *bbuf = NULL;
00516     int x, y, icontype;
00517     char iconfilestr[FILE_MAX];
00518     
00519     if ((btheme != NULL) && btheme->tui.iconfile[0]) {
00520         char *icondir = BLI_get_folder(BLENDER_DATAFILES, "icons");
00521         if (icondir) {
00522             BLI_join_dirfile(iconfilestr, sizeof(iconfilestr), icondir, btheme->tui.iconfile);
00523             bbuf = IMB_loadiffname(iconfilestr, IB_rect); /* if the image is missing bbuf will just be NULL */
00524             if (bbuf && (bbuf->x < ICON_IMAGE_W || bbuf->y < ICON_IMAGE_H)) {
00525                 printf("\n***WARNING***\nIcons file %s too small.\nUsing built-in Icons instead\n", iconfilestr);
00526                 IMB_freeImBuf(bbuf);
00527                 bbuf = NULL;
00528             }
00529         }
00530         else {
00531             printf("%s: 'icons' data path not found, continuing\n", __func__);
00532         }
00533     }
00534     if (bbuf == NULL)
00535         bbuf = IMB_ibImageFromMemory((unsigned char *)datatoc_blender_icons_png, datatoc_blender_icons_png_size, IB_rect, "<blender icons>");
00536 
00537     if (bbuf) {
00538         /* free existing texture if any */
00539         if (icongltex.id) {
00540             glDeleteTextures(1, &icongltex.id);
00541             icongltex.id = 0;
00542         }
00543 
00544         /* we only use a texture for cards with non-power of two */
00545         if (GPU_non_power_of_two_support()) {
00546             glGenTextures(1, &icongltex.id);
00547 
00548             if (icongltex.id) {
00549                 icongltex.w = bbuf->x;
00550                 icongltex.h = bbuf->y;
00551                 icongltex.invw = 1.0f / bbuf->x;
00552                 icongltex.invh = 1.0f / bbuf->y;
00553 
00554                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, icongltex.id);
00555                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, bbuf->x, bbuf->y, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, bbuf->rect);
00556                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00557                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00558                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00559 
00560                 if (glGetError() == GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY) {
00561                     glDeleteTextures(1, &icongltex.id);
00562                     icongltex.id = 0;
00563                 }
00564             }
00565         }
00566     }
00567 
00568     if (icongltex.id)
00569         icontype = ICON_TYPE_TEXTURE;
00570     else
00571         icontype = ICON_TYPE_BUFFER;
00572     
00573     if (bbuf) {
00574         for (y = 0; y < ICON_GRID_ROWS; y++) {
00575             for (x = 0; x < ICON_GRID_COLS; x++) {
00576                 def_internal_icon(bbuf, BIFICONID_FIRST + y * ICON_GRID_COLS + x,
00577                                   x * (ICON_GRID_W + ICON_GRID_MARGIN) + ICON_GRID_MARGIN,
00578                                   y * (ICON_GRID_H + ICON_GRID_MARGIN) + ICON_GRID_MARGIN, ICON_GRID_W,
00579                                   icontype);
00580             }
00581         }
00582     }
00583 
00584     def_internal_vicon(VICO_VIEW3D_VEC, vicon_view3d_draw);
00585     def_internal_vicon(VICO_EDIT_VEC, vicon_edit_draw);
00586     def_internal_vicon(VICO_EDITMODE_DEHLT, vicon_editmode_dehlt_draw);
00587     def_internal_vicon(VICO_EDITMODE_HLT, vicon_editmode_hlt_draw);
00588     def_internal_vicon(VICO_DISCLOSURE_TRI_RIGHT_VEC, vicon_disclosure_tri_right_draw);
00589     def_internal_vicon(VICO_DISCLOSURE_TRI_DOWN_VEC, vicon_disclosure_tri_down_draw);
00590     def_internal_vicon(VICO_MOVE_UP_VEC, vicon_move_up_draw);
00591     def_internal_vicon(VICO_MOVE_DOWN_VEC, vicon_move_down_draw);
00592     def_internal_vicon(VICO_X_VEC, vicon_x_draw);
00593     def_internal_vicon(VICO_SMALL_TRI_RIGHT_VEC, vicon_small_tri_right_draw);
00594 
00595     IMB_freeImBuf(bbuf);
00596 }
00597 #endif // WITH_HEADLESS
00598 
00599 static void init_iconfile_list(struct ListBase *list)
00600 {
00601     IconFile *ifile;
00602     struct direntry *dir;
00603     int restoredir = 1; /* restore to current directory */
00604     int totfile, i, index = 1;
00605     const char *icondir;
00606     char olddir[FILE_MAX];
00607 
00608     list->first = list->last = NULL;
00609     icondir = BLI_get_folder(BLENDER_DATAFILES, "icons");
00610 
00611     if (icondir == NULL)
00612         return;
00613     
00614     /* since BLI_dir_contents changes the current working directory, restore it 
00615      * back to old value afterwards */
00616     if (!BLI_current_working_dir(olddir, sizeof(olddir))) 
00617         restoredir = 0;
00618     totfile = BLI_dir_contents(icondir, &dir);
00619     if (restoredir && !chdir(olddir)) {} /* fix warning about checking return value */
00620 
00621     for (i = 0; i < totfile; i++) {
00622         if ( (dir[i].type & S_IFREG) ) {
00623             char *filename = dir[i].relname;
00624             
00625             if (BLI_testextensie(filename, ".png")) {
00626                 /* loading all icons on file start is overkill & slows startup
00627                  * its possible they change size after blender load anyway. */
00628 #if 0
00629                 int ifilex, ifiley;
00630                 char iconfilestr[FILE_MAX + 16]; /* allow 256 chars for file+dir */
00631                 ImBuf *bbuf = NULL;
00632                 /* check to see if the image is the right size, continue if not */
00633                 /* copying strings here should go ok, assuming that we never get back
00634                  * a complete path to file longer than 256 chars */
00635                 BLI_join_dirfile(iconfilestr, sizeof(iconfilestr), icondir, filename);
00636                 bbuf = IMB_loadiffname(iconfilestr, IB_rect);
00637 
00638                 if (bbuf) {
00639                     ifilex = bbuf->x;
00640                     ifiley = bbuf->y;
00641                     IMB_freeImBuf(bbuf);
00642                 }
00643                 else {
00644                     ifilex = ifiley = 0;
00645                 }
00646                 
00647                 /* bad size or failed to load */
00648                 if ((ifilex != ICON_IMAGE_W) || (ifiley != ICON_IMAGE_H)) {
00649                     printf("icon '%s' is wrong size %dx%d\n", iconfilestr, ifilex, ifiley);
00650                     continue;
00651                 }
00652 #endif          /* removed */
00653 
00654                 /* found a potential icon file, so make an entry for it in the cache list */
00655                 ifile = MEM_callocN(sizeof(IconFile), "IconFile");
00656                 
00657                 BLI_strncpy(ifile->filename, filename, sizeof(ifile->filename));
00658                 ifile->index = index;
00659 
00660                 BLI_addtail(list, ifile);
00661                 
00662                 index++;
00663             }
00664         }
00665     }
00666     
00667     /* free temporary direntry structure that's been created by BLI_dir_contents() */
00668     i = totfile - 1;
00669     
00670     for (; i >= 0; i--) {
00671         MEM_freeN(dir[i].relname);
00672         MEM_freeN(dir[i].path);
00673         if (dir[i].string) {
00674             MEM_freeN(dir[i].string);
00675         }
00676     }
00677     free(dir);
00678     dir = NULL;
00679 }
00680 
00681 static void free_iconfile_list(struct ListBase *list)
00682 {
00683     IconFile *ifile = NULL, *next_ifile = NULL;
00684     
00685     for (ifile = list->first; ifile; ifile = next_ifile) {
00686         next_ifile = ifile->next;
00687         BLI_freelinkN(list, ifile);
00688     }
00689 }
00690 
00691 int UI_iconfile_get_index(const char *filename)
00692 {
00693     IconFile *ifile;
00694     ListBase *list = &(iconfilelist);
00695     
00696     for (ifile = list->first; ifile; ifile = ifile->next) {
00697         if (BLI_path_cmp(filename, ifile->filename) == 0) {
00698             return ifile->index;
00699         }
00700     }
00701     
00702     return 0;
00703 }
00704 
00705 ListBase *UI_iconfile_list(void)
00706 {
00707     ListBase *list = &(iconfilelist);
00708     
00709     return list;
00710 }

00713 void UI_icons_free(void)
00714 {
00715 #ifndef WITH_HEADLESS
00716     if (icongltex.id) {
00717         glDeleteTextures(1, &icongltex.id);
00718         icongltex.id = 0;
00719     }
00720 
00721     free_iconfile_list(&iconfilelist);
00722     BKE_icons_free();
00723 #endif
00724 }
00725 
00726 void UI_icons_free_drawinfo(void *drawinfo)
00727 {
00728     DrawInfo *di = drawinfo;
00729 
00730     if (di) {
00731         if (di->type == ICON_TYPE_BUFFER) {
00732             if (di->data.buffer.image) {
00733                 MEM_freeN(di->data.buffer.image->rect);
00734                 MEM_freeN(di->data.buffer.image);
00735             }
00736         }
00737 
00738         MEM_freeN(di);
00739     }
00740 }
00741 
00742 static DrawInfo *icon_create_drawinfo(void)
00743 {
00744     DrawInfo *di = NULL;
00745 
00746     di = MEM_callocN(sizeof(DrawInfo), "di_icon");
00747     di->type = ICON_TYPE_PREVIEW;
00748 
00749     return di;
00750 }
00751 
00752 /* note!, returns unscaled by DPI, may need to multiply result by UI_DPI_ICON_FAC */
00753 int UI_icon_get_width(int icon_id)
00754 {
00755     Icon *icon = NULL;
00756     DrawInfo *di = NULL;
00757 
00758     icon = BKE_icon_get(icon_id);
00759     
00760     if (icon == NULL) {
00761         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00762             printf("%s: Internal error, no icon for icon ID: %d\n", __func__, icon_id);
00763         return 0;
00764     }
00765     
00766     di = (DrawInfo *)icon->drawinfo;
00767     if (!di) {
00768         di = icon_create_drawinfo();
00769         icon->drawinfo = di;
00770     }
00771 
00772     if (di)
00773         return ICON_DEFAULT_WIDTH;
00774 
00775     return 0;
00776 }
00777 
00778 int UI_icon_get_height(int icon_id)
00779 {
00780     Icon *icon = NULL;
00781     DrawInfo *di = NULL;
00782 
00783     icon = BKE_icon_get(icon_id);
00784     
00785     if (icon == NULL) {
00786         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00787             printf("%s: Internal error, no icon for icon ID: %d\n", __func__, icon_id);
00788         return 0;
00789     }
00790     
00791     di = (DrawInfo *)icon->drawinfo;
00792 
00793     if (!di) {
00794         di = icon_create_drawinfo();
00795         icon->drawinfo = di;
00796     }
00797     
00798     if (di)
00799         return ICON_DEFAULT_HEIGHT;
00800 
00801     return 0;
00802 }

00804 void UI_icons_init(int first_dyn_id)
00805 {
00806 #ifdef WITH_HEADLESS
00807     (void)first_dyn_id;
00808 #else
00809     init_iconfile_list(&iconfilelist);

00813 #endif

00815 
00816 /* Render size for preview images and icons
00817  */
00818 static int preview_render_size(enum eIconSizes size)
00819 {
00820     switch (size) {
00821         case ICON_SIZE_ICON:    return 32;
00822         case ICON_SIZE_PREVIEW: return PREVIEW_DEFAULT_HEIGHT;
00823     }
00824     return 0;
00825 }
00826 
00827 /* Create rect for the icon
00828  */
00829 static void icon_create_rect(struct PreviewImage *prv_img, enum eIconSizes size)
00830 {
00831     unsigned int render_size = preview_render_size(size);
00832 
00833     if (!prv_img) {
00834         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00835             printf("%s, error: requested preview image does not exist", __func__);
00836     }
00837     if (!prv_img->rect[size]) {
00838         prv_img->w[size] = render_size;
00839         prv_img->h[size] = render_size;
00840         prv_img->changed[size] = 1;
00841         prv_img->changed_timestamp[size] = 0;
00842         prv_img->rect[size] = MEM_callocN(render_size * render_size * sizeof(unsigned int), "prv_rect");
00843     }
00844 }
00845 
00846 /* only called when icon has changed */
00847 /* only call with valid pointer from UI_icon_draw */
00848 static void icon_set_image(bContext *C, ID *id, PreviewImage *prv_img, enum eIconSizes size)
00849 {
00850     if (!prv_img) {
00851         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00852             printf("%s: no preview image for this ID: %s\n", __func__, id->name);
00853         return;
00854     }   
00855 
00856     icon_create_rect(prv_img, size);
00857 
00858     ED_preview_icon_job(C, prv_img, id, prv_img->rect[size],
00859                         prv_img->w[size], prv_img->h[size]);
00860 }
00861 
00862 static void icon_draw_rect(float x, float y, int w, int h, float UNUSED(aspect), int rw, int rh, unsigned int *rect, float alpha, const float rgb[3], short is_preview)
00863 {
00864     ImBuf *ima = NULL;
00865 
00866     /* sanity check */
00867     if (w <= 0 || h <= 0 || w > 2000 || h > 2000) {
00868         printf("%s: icons are %i x %i pixels?\n", __func__, w, h);
00869         BLI_assert(!"invalid icon size");
00870         return;
00871     }
00872 
00873     /* modulate color */
00874     if (alpha != 1.0f)
00875         glPixelTransferf(GL_ALPHA_SCALE, alpha);
00876 
00877     if (rgb) {
00878         glPixelTransferf(GL_RED_SCALE, rgb[0]);
00879         glPixelTransferf(GL_GREEN_SCALE, rgb[1]);
00880         glPixelTransferf(GL_BLUE_SCALE, rgb[2]);
00881     }
00882 
00883     /* rect contains image in 'rendersize', we only scale if needed */
00884     if (rw != w && rh != h) {
00885         /* first allocate imbuf for scaling and copy preview into it */
00886         ima = IMB_allocImBuf(rw, rh, 32, IB_rect);
00887         memcpy(ima->rect, rect, rw * rh * sizeof(unsigned int));
00888         IMB_scaleImBuf(ima, w, h); /* scale it */
00889         rect = ima->rect;
00890     }
00891 
00892     /* draw */
00893     if (is_preview) {
00894         glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, w, h, w, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, rect);
00895     }
00896     else {
00897         glRasterPos2f(x, y);
00898         glDrawPixels(w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, rect);
00899     }
00900 
00901     if (ima)
00902         IMB_freeImBuf(ima);
00903 
00904     /* restore color */
00905     if (alpha != 0.0f)
00906         glPixelTransferf(GL_ALPHA_SCALE, 1.0f);
00907     
00908     if (rgb) {
00909         glPixelTransferf(GL_RED_SCALE, 1.0f);
00910         glPixelTransferf(GL_GREEN_SCALE, 1.0f);
00911         glPixelTransferf(GL_BLUE_SCALE, 1.0f);
00912     }
00913 }
00914 
00915 static void icon_draw_texture(float x, float y, float w, float h, int ix, int iy, int UNUSED(iw), int ih, float alpha, const float rgb[3])
00916 {
00917     float x1, x2, y1, y2;
00918 
00919     if (rgb) glColor4f(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2], alpha);
00920     else glColor4f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, alpha);
00921 
00922     x1 = ix * icongltex.invw;
00923     x2 = (ix + ih) * icongltex.invw;
00924     y1 = iy * icongltex.invh;
00925     y2 = (iy + ih) * icongltex.invh;
00926 
00927     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00928     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, icongltex.id);
00929 
00930     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00931     glTexCoord2f(x1, y1);
00932     glVertex2f(x, y);
00933 
00934     glTexCoord2f(x2, y1);
00935     glVertex2f(x + w, y);
00936 
00937     glTexCoord2f(x2, y2);
00938     glVertex2f(x + w, y + h);
00939 
00940     glTexCoord2f(x1, y2);
00941     glVertex2f(x, y + h);
00942     glEnd();
00943 
00944     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00945     glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00946 }
00947 
00948 /* Drawing size for preview images */
00949 static int get_draw_size(enum eIconSizes size)
00950 {
00951     switch (size) {
00952         case ICON_SIZE_ICON: return ICON_DEFAULT_HEIGHT;
00953         case ICON_SIZE_PREVIEW: return PREVIEW_DEFAULT_HEIGHT;
00954     }
00955     return 0;
00956 }
00957 
00958 static void icon_draw_size(float x, float y, int icon_id, float aspect, float alpha, const float rgb[3], enum eIconSizes size, int draw_size, int UNUSED(nocreate), short is_preview)
00959 {
00960     bTheme *btheme = UI_GetTheme();
00961     Icon *icon = NULL;
00962     DrawInfo *di = NULL;
00963     IconImage *iimg;
00964     float fdraw_size = is_preview ? draw_size : (draw_size * UI_DPI_ICON_FAC);
00965     int w, h;
00966     
00967     icon = BKE_icon_get(icon_id);
00968     alpha *= btheme->tui.icon_alpha;
00969     
00970     if (icon == NULL) {
00971         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00972             printf("%s: Internal error, no icon for icon ID: %d\n", __func__, icon_id);
00973         return;
00974     }
00975 
00976     di = (DrawInfo *)icon->drawinfo;
00977     
00978     if (!di) {
00979         di = icon_create_drawinfo();
00980     
00981         icon->drawinfo = di;        
00982         icon->drawinfo_free = UI_icons_free_drawinfo;       
00983     }
00984     
00985     /* scale width and height according to aspect */
00986     w = (int)(fdraw_size / aspect + 0.5f);
00987     h = (int)(fdraw_size / aspect + 0.5f);
00988     
00989     if (di->type == ICON_TYPE_VECTOR) {
00990         /* vector icons use the uiBlock transformation, they are not drawn
00991          * with untransformed coordinates like the other icons */
00992         di->data.vector.func((int)x, (int)y, ICON_DEFAULT_HEIGHT, ICON_DEFAULT_HEIGHT, 1.0f); 
00993     } 
00994     else if (di->type == ICON_TYPE_TEXTURE) {
00995         icon_draw_texture(x, y, (float)w, (float)h, di->data.texture.x, di->data.texture.y,
00996                           di->data.texture.w, di->data.texture.h, alpha, rgb);
00997     }
00998     else if (di->type == ICON_TYPE_BUFFER) {
00999         /* it is a builtin icon */      
01000         iimg = di->data.buffer.image;
01001 
01002         if (!iimg->rect) return;  /* something has gone wrong! */
01003 
01004         icon_draw_rect(x, y, w, h, aspect, iimg->w, iimg->h, iimg->rect, alpha, rgb, is_preview);
01005     }
01006     else if (di->type == ICON_TYPE_PREVIEW) {
01007         PreviewImage *pi = BKE_previewimg_get((ID *)icon->obj);
01008 
01009         if (pi) {           
01010             /* no create icon on this level in code */
01011             if (!pi->rect[size]) return;  /* something has gone wrong! */
01012             
01013             /* preview images use premul alpha ... */
01014             glBlendFunc(GL_ONE, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
01015             icon_draw_rect(x, y, w, h, aspect, pi->w[size], pi->h[size], pi->rect[size], 1.0f, NULL, is_preview);
01016             glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
01017         }
01018     }
01019 }
01020 
01021 static void ui_id_preview_image_render_size(bContext *C, ID *id, PreviewImage *pi, int size)
01022 {
01023     if ((pi->changed[size] || !pi->rect[size])) { /* changed only ever set by dynamic icons */
01024         /* create the rect if necessary */
01025         icon_set_image(C, id, pi, size);
01026 
01027         pi->changed[size] = 0;
01028     }
01029 }
01030 
01031 static void ui_id_icon_render(bContext *C, ID *id, int big)
01032 {
01033     PreviewImage *pi = BKE_previewimg_get(id);
01034 
01035     if (pi) {
01036         if (big)
01037             ui_id_preview_image_render_size(C, id, pi, ICON_SIZE_PREVIEW);  /* bigger preview size */
01038         else
01039             ui_id_preview_image_render_size(C, id, pi, ICON_SIZE_ICON);     /* icon size */
01040     }
01041 }
01042 
01043 static void ui_id_brush_render(bContext *C, ID *id)
01044 {
01045     PreviewImage *pi = BKE_previewimg_get(id); 
01046     enum eIconSizes i;
01047     
01048     if (!pi)
01049         return;
01050     
01051     for (i = 0; i < NUM_ICON_SIZES; i++) {
01052         /* check if rect needs to be created; changed
01053          * only set by dynamic icons */
01054         if ((pi->changed[i] || !pi->rect[i])) {
01055             icon_set_image(C, id, pi, i);
01056             pi->changed[i] = 0;
01057         }
01058     }
01059 }
01060 
01061 
01062 static int ui_id_brush_get_icon(bContext *C, ID *id)
01063 {
01064     Brush *br = (Brush *)id;
01065 
01066     if (br->flag & BRUSH_CUSTOM_ICON) {
01067         BKE_icon_getid(id);
01068         ui_id_brush_render(C, id);
01069     }
01070     else {
01071         Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
01072         SpaceImage *sima;
01073         EnumPropertyItem *items = NULL;
01074         int tool, mode = 0;
01075 
01076         /* XXX: this is not nice, should probably make brushes
01077          * be strictly in one paint mode only to avoid
01078          * checking various context stuff here */
01079 
01080         if (CTX_wm_view3d(C) && ob) {
01081             if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT)
01082                 mode = OB_MODE_SCULPT;
01083             else if (ob->mode & (OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT | OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT))
01084                 mode = OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT;
01085             else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT)
01086                 mode = OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT;
01087         }
01088         else if ((sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C)) &&
01089                  (sima->flag & SI_DRAWTOOL))
01090         {
01091             mode = OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT;
01092         }
01093 
01094         /* reset the icon */
01095         if (mode == OB_MODE_SCULPT) {
01096             items = brush_sculpt_tool_items;
01097             tool = br->sculpt_tool;
01098         }
01099         else if (mode == OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT) {
01100             items = brush_vertex_tool_items;
01101             tool = br->vertexpaint_tool;
01102         }
01103         else if (mode == OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT) {
01104             items = brush_image_tool_items;
01105             tool = br->imagepaint_tool;
01106         }
01107 
01108         if (!items || !RNA_enum_icon_from_value(items, tool, &id->icon_id))
01109             id->icon_id = 0;
01110     }
01111 
01112     return id->icon_id;
01113 }
01114 
01115 int ui_id_icon_get(bContext *C, ID *id, int big)
01116 {
01117     int iconid = 0;
01118     
01119     /* icon */
01120     switch (GS(id->name)) {
01121         case ID_BR:
01122             iconid = ui_id_brush_get_icon(C, id);
01123             break;
01124         case ID_MA: /* fall through */
01125         case ID_TE: /* fall through */
01126         case ID_IM: /* fall through */
01127         case ID_WO: /* fall through */
01128         case ID_LA: /* fall through */
01129             iconid = BKE_icon_getid(id);
01130             /* checks if not exists, or changed */
01131             ui_id_icon_render(C, id, big);
01132             break;
01133         default:
01134             break;
01135     }
01136 
01137     return iconid;
01138 }

01140 static void icon_draw_at_size(float x, float y, int icon_id, float aspect, float alpha, enum eIconSizes size, int nocreate)
01141 {
01142     int draw_size = get_draw_size(size);
01143     icon_draw_size(x, y, icon_id, aspect, alpha, NULL, size, draw_size, nocreate, FALSE);
01144 }

01149 }
